name: sliced in sauce
title: Gourmet Nature's Creations · sliced in sauce

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: With chicken: Composition: Meat and animal derivatives* (21% of which chicken 14%), vegetable protein extracts, fish and fish derivatives*, vegetables* (0.7% dehydrated tomatoes, equivalent to 6.3% tomatoes ; 0.3% dehydrated spinach, equivalent to 2.7% spinach), minerals, derivatives of vegetable origin, various sugars. *natural ingredients. With Turkey: Composition: Meat and animal derivatives* (22% of which turkey 14%), vegetable protein extracts, fish and fish derivatives*, vegetables* (0.5% dehydrated parsnip, equivalent to 4.5% parsnip ; 0.3% dehydrated spinach, equivalent to 2.7% spinach), minerals, derivatives of vegetable origin, various sugars. *natural ingredients.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional Additives: IU/kg : Vit A : 880; Vit D3 : 134; mg/kg : Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate : (Fe: 10); Calcium iodate anhydrous : (I: 0.25); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate : (Cu: 0.8); Manganous sulphate monohydrate : (Mn: 1.9); Zinc sulphate monohydrate : (Zn: 18.2); Taurine : 550. flavourings.

usageInformation.usage: GOURMET Nature's Creations offers a selection of delicious recipes inspired by nature. Each menu has been carefully and expertly prepared with selected, high-quality and natural ingredients.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Rich in chicken, garnished with spinach and rice and rich in turkey, garnished with spinach and parsnips

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide: for an average adult cat (4kg), feed 3 cans per day in at least 2-3 separate meals. The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight. Serve at room temperature. Fresh clean drinking water should be always available.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a dry and cool place
